comment: first step of three-step reaction (see R11710, R11484+R10437+R11709)
definition: S-Adenosyl-L-methionine + Bacteriochlorophyllide c + H2O <=> 7-(Hydroxymethyl)bacteriochlorophyllide c + 5'-Deoxyadenosine + L-Methionine
name: bacteriochlorophyllide-c:S-adenosyl-L-methionine oxidoreductase (C-7(1)-hydroxylating)
